game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent the board of a chess game.
    Author:
    Tim Remmert

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(int x, int y)
      initializes the board to the starting position of all pieces

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(int x,
             int y)
        initializes the board to the starting position of all pieces
        Parameters:
        x - This is the number of rows and it will always be 8
        y - This is the number of columns and it will always be 8

    • Method Detail

      • toogleturns

        public void toogleturns()
        Method to end one players turn and begin another's

      • map

        public int[] map(java.lang.String input)
        Method to map a two letter string to its location in the board
        Parameters:
        input - This is the string location of the tile
        Returns:
        This is an integer array with the first number being the row location and the second number being the column location

      • emptyCheck

        public boolean emptyCheck(int x,
                          int y)
        Method to check if a given on the board has a piece or not
        Parameters:
        x - This is the row location of the board
        y - This is the column location of the board
        Returns:
        Return true if a piece is on the tile, and false if there is no piece on the tile.

      • getPiece

        public pieces.Piece getPiece(int x,
                             int y)
        Method to get a piece on a tile
        Parameters:
        x - This is the row location of the tile on the board
        y - This is the column location of the tile on the board
        Returns:
        Returns the piece on the tile at the location requested.

      • getPlayer

        public game.Player getPlayer(int x,
                             int y)
        Method to return the player a given piece on the board belongs to
        Parameters:
        x - This is the row location of the piece
        y - This is the column location of the piece
        Returns:
        Returns the player the piece at the location belongs to

      • setEmptyTile

        public game.Tile setEmptyTile(java.lang.String loc)
        Method to set a tile of the board to a tile without a piece
        Parameters:
        loc - This is the location of the piece on the board
        Returns:
        Returns a new empty tile at the requested location

      • setEmptyTile

        public game.Tile setEmptyTile(int x,
                              int y)
        Method to set a tile of the board to a tile without a piece
        Parameters:
        x - This is the row location of the piece
        y - This is the column location of the piece
        Returns:
        Returns a new empty tile at the requested location

      • setOccuppiedTile

        public game.Tile setOccuppiedTile(pieces.Piece p,
                                  java.lang.String loc)
        Method to set a tile at a given location to one with the given piece on it.
        Parameters:
        p - This is the piece to be placed on the tile
        loc - This is the location of the tile
        Returns:
        Returns a new tile with the piece on at the requested location

      • setOccuppiedTile

        public game.Tile setOccuppiedTile(pieces.Piece p,
                                  int x,
                                  int y)
        Method to set a tile at a given location to one with the given piece on it.
        Parameters:
        p - This is the piece to be placed on the tile
        x - This is the row location of the tile on the board
        y - This is the column location of the tile on the board
        Returns:
        Returns a new tile with the piece on at the requested location

      • findCheck

        public boolean findCheck(int x,
                         int y)
        Method to determine if a players king is in check.
        Parameters:
        x - row location of the player king on the board
        y - column location of the players king on the board
        Returns:
        Returns true if the players king is in check and false if it is not.

      • findCheckMate

        public boolean findCheckMate(int[] bK)
        Method to determine if a players king in is check mate
        Parameters:
        bK - This is an integer array with the first value being the row location of the king on the board, and the second value being the column location of the king on the board
        Returns:
        Returns true if the players king is in check mate and false if it is not

      • printBoard

        public void printBoard()
        Method to print to current board according to the assignment guidelines, and the location of each piece.
